snippet: David O’Connor was a longtime executive of the Creative Artists Agency, which represents Carmelo Anthony, as well as the Knicks executives Allan Houston and Mark Warkentien.
abstract: David O’Connor becomes president and chief executive of Madison Square Garden; has been executive for 32 years at Creative Artists Agency, which represents several basketball players with ties to New York Knicks, including forward Carmelo Anthony.
lead_paragraph: David O’Connor was a longtime executive of the Creative Artists Agency, which represents Carmelo Anthony, as well as the Knicks executives Allan Houston and Mark Warkentien.

headline.main: Garden Hires New President From Agency With Knick Ties
headline.print_headline: Garden Hires New President From Agency With Knick Ties
